original_text: The sons of Reuben, and the Gadites, and half the tribe of Manasseh, of valiant men, men able to bear buckler and sword, and to shoot with bow, and skilful in war, were four and forty thousand seven hundred and threescore, that went out to the war.
korean_text: 르우벤 자손과 갓 사람과 므낫세 반 지파에서 나가 싸울 만한 용사 곧 능히 방패와 칼을 들며 활을 당겨 싸움에 익숙한 자는 사만 사천칠백육십 명이라

sentences.original_text: The sons of Reuben, and the Gadites, and half the tribe of Manasseh
sentences.korean_translation: 르우벤의 자손들과 갓 사람들과 므낫세 반 지파

sentences.original_text: men able to bear buckler and sword
sentences.korean_translation: 방패와 칼을 들 수 있는 사람들이었고

sentences.original_text: were four and forty thousand seven hundred and threescore
that went out to the war
